import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'rea' function WatchList({watchlist,setWatchlist,removefromWatchlist}) { return (
{/* render the bots in cards */}
{ watchlist.map((movie)=>(
{movie.title}
{/* style the bot details */}

{movie.genres}

{movie.rating}

{movie.language}

)) }
) } export default WatchList
